summary: DEFECTIVE POWER DOOR LOCKS.  LOCKS PRODUCE A LOUD SCREECHING NOISE UPON LOCKING OR UNLOCKING.  DOORS THEN FAIL TO UNLOCK WHEN THE DOOR HANDLE IS PULLED.  THIS CAN CREATE A SAFETY CONCERN WHEN DRIVER AND PASSENGERS ATTEMPT TO EGRESS VEHICLE IN AN EMERGENCY.    THIS IS A 3 TIME RECURRING PROBLEM WHICH FIRST HAPPENED WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS UNDER WARRANTY AND HAS AGAIN OCCURRED IN JANUARY 2003
